name: Cyprus Consumers Union & Quality of Life
goal: PEKPIZO is a non profit, non government and non political organization for protecting the Cypriot consumers rights and interests
interests: Banking and financial services, Climate Action, Competition, Consumers, Culture and media, Digital economy and society, Education and training, Energy, Environment, Food Safety, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health, Single market, Trans-European Networks, Youth
euInitiatives: Member of ECCG and member of ANEC
